title: Version History
description: A record of how the data collection has changed over time.

version_number.description: A version number for a study.

version_date.description: The date on which a given version of a data collection was released.

version_note.description: Provenance information about a given version of the data collection.
examples: File CB3025.ALL.PDF was removed from any previous datasets and flagged as a study-level file, so that it will accompany all downloads.
The data producer provided additional data files.
The codebook descriptions of variables TANSUP, EMOSUP, and SOCSUP were corrected.

examples.version_note: The data producer provided additional data files.
